Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                     J. Alakuijala
Request for Comments: 7932                                   Z. Szabadka
Category: Informational                                     Google, Inc.
ISSN: 2070-1721                                                July 2016
Brotli Compressed Data Format
contents.zh-CHS: Brotli压缩数据格式

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This specification defines a lossless compressed data format that compresses data using a combination of the LZ77 algorithm and Huffman coding, with efficiency comparable to the best currently available general-purpose compression methods.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义了无损压缩数据格式，该格式使用LZ77算法和哈夫曼编码的组合来压缩数据，其效率可与当前可用的最佳通用压缩方法相媲美。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: 1.1. Purpose
The purpose of this specification is to define a lossless compressed data format that:
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范旨在定义无损压缩数据格式，该格式：

contents.text: * is independent of CPU type, operating system, file system, and character set; hence, it can be used for interchange.
contents.zh-CHS: * 独立于CPU类型、操作系统、文件系统和字符集；因此，它可以用于交换。

contents.text: * can be produced or consumed, even for an arbitrarily long, sequentially presented input data stream, using only an a priori bounded amount of intermediate storage; hence, it can be used in data communications or similar structures, such as Unix filters.
contents.zh-CHS: * 即使对于任意长的、顺序呈现的输入数据流，也可以仅使用先验有界的中间存储量来产生或消耗；因此，它可以用于数据通信或类似结构，如Unix筛选器。

contents.text: * compresses data with a compression ratio comparable to the best currently available general-purpose compression methods, in particular, considerably better than the gzip program.
contents.zh-CHS: * 压缩数据的压缩比与当前可用的最佳通用压缩方法相当，特别是比gzip程序要好得多。

contents.text: * decompresses much faster than current LZMA implementations.
contents.zh-CHS: * 解压缩速度比当前的LZMA实现快得多。

contents.text: The data format defined by this specification does not attempt to:
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范定义的数据格式不会试图：

contents.text: * allow random access to compressed data.
contents.zh-CHS: * 允许对压缩数据进行随机访问。

contents.text: * compress specialized data (e.g., raster graphics) as densely as the best currently available specialized algorithms.
contents.zh-CHS: * 压缩专用数据（如光栅图形）的密度与当前可用的最佳专用算法的密度相同。

contents.text: This document is the authoritative specification of the brotli compressed data format. It defines the set of valid brotli compressed data streams and a decoder algorithm that produces the uncompressed data stream from a valid brotli compressed data stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档是brotli压缩数据格式的权威规范。它定义了一组有效的brotli压缩数据流和一个解码器算法，该算法从有效的brotli压缩数据流生成未压缩的数据流。

contents.text: 1.2. Intended Audience
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 目标受众

contents.text: This specification is intended for use by software implementers to compress data into and/or decompress data from the brotli format.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范旨在供软件实施者用于将数据压缩为brotli格式和/或从brotli格式解压数据。

contents.text: The text of the specification assumes a basic background in programming at the level of bits and other primitive data representations. Familiarity with the technique of Huffman coding is helpful but not required.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范的文本假定在位和其他原始数据表示级别编程的基本背景。熟悉哈夫曼编码技术是有帮助的，但不是必需的。

contents.text: This specification uses (heavily) the notations and terminology introduced in the DEFLATE format specification [RFC1951]. For the sake of completeness, we always include the whole text of the relevant parts of RFC 1951; therefore, familiarity with the DEFLATE format is helpful but not required.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范（大量）使用了DEFLATE格式规范[RFC1951]中引入的符号和术语。为完整起见，我们始终包含RFC 1951相关部分的全文；因此，熟悉DEFLATE格式是有帮助的，但不是必需的。

contents.text: The compressed data format defined in this specification is an integral part of the WOFF File Format 2.0 [WOFF2]; therefore, this specification is also intended for implementers of WOFF 2.0 compressors and decompressors.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范中定义的压缩数据格式是WOFF文件格式2.0[WOFF2]的组成部分；因此，本规范也适用于WOFF 2.0压缩器和解压缩器的实现者。

contents.text: 1.3. Scope
This document specifies a method for representing a sequence of bytes as a (usually shorter) sequence of bits and a method for packing the latter bit sequence into bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档指定了一种将字节序列表示为（通常更短）位序列的方法，以及将后一位序列打包为字节的方法。

contents.text: 1.4. Compliance

Unless otherwise indicated below, a compliant decompressor must be able to accept and decompress any data set that conforms to all the specifications presented here. A compliant compressor must produce data sets that conform to all the specifications presented here.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非下文另有说明，否则符合要求的解压器必须能够接受和解压符合此处所有规范的任何数据集。合规压缩机必须生成符合此处所述所有规范的数据集。

contents.text: 1.5. Definitions of Terms and Conventions Used
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5. 使用的术语和约定的定义

contents.text: Byte: 8 bits stored or transmitted as a unit (same as an octet). For this specification, a byte is exactly 8 bits, even on machines that store a character on a number of bits different from eight. See below for the numbering of bits within a byte.
contents.zh-CHS: 字节：作为一个单位存储或传输的8位（与八位字节相同）。对于本规范，一个字节正好是8位，即使在将字符存储在不同于8位的位数上的机器上也是如此。有关字节内位的编号，请参见下文。

contents.text: String: a sequence of arbitrary bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 字符串：任意字节的序列。

contents.text: Bytes stored within a computer do not have a "bit order", since they are always treated as a unit. However, a byte considered as an integer between 0 and 255 does have a most and least significant bit (lsb), and since we write numbers with the most significant digit on the left, we also write bytes with the most significant bit (msb) on the left. In the diagrams below, we number the bits of a byte so that bit 0 is the least significant bit, i.e., the bits are numbered:
contents.zh-CHS: 存储在计算机中的字节没有“位顺序”，因为它们始终被视为一个单元。但是，被认为是0到255之间的整数的字节确实有最高和最低有效位（lsb），因为我们写的数字左边有最高有效位，所以我们也写左边有最高有效位（msb）的字节。在下图中，我们对字节的位进行编号，使位0为最低有效位，即对位进行编号：

contents.text: Within a computer, a number may occupy multiple bytes. All multi-byte numbers in the format described here are stored with the least significant byte first (at the lower memory address). For example, the decimal number 520 is stored as:
contents.zh-CHS: 在计算机中，一个数字可能占用多个字节。这里描述的格式中的所有多字节数都以最低有效字节（位于较低的内存地址）存储。例如，十进制数520存储为：

contents.text: 1.5.1. Packing into Bytes
contents.zh-CHS: 1.5.1. 压缩成字节

contents.text: This document does not address the issue of the order in which bits of a byte are transmitted on a bit-sequential medium, since the final data format described here is byte rather than bit oriented. However, we describe the compressed block format below as a sequence of data elements of various bit lengths, not a sequence of bytes. Therefore, we must specify how to pack these data elements into bytes to form the final compressed byte sequence:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不涉及字节位在位序列介质上传输的顺序问题，因为此处描述的最终数据格式是字节而不是面向位的。然而，我们在下面将压缩块格式描述为具有不同比特长度的数据元素序列，而不是字节序列。因此，我们必须指定如何将这些数据元素打包成字节，以形成最终的压缩字节序列：

contents.text: * Data elements are packed into bytes in order of increasing bit number within the byte, i.e., starting with the least significant bit of the byte.
contents.zh-CHS: * 数据元素按字节内位数的递增顺序打包到字节中，即从字节的最低有效位开始。

contents.text: * Data elements other than prefix codes are packed starting with the least significant bit of the data element. These are referred to here as "integer values" and are considered unsigned.
contents.zh-CHS: * 前缀代码以外的数据元素从数据元素的最低有效位开始打包。这些在这里被称为“整数值”，被认为是无符号的。

contents.text: * Prefix codes are packed starting with the most significant bit of the code.
contents.zh-CHS: * 前缀代码从代码的最高有效位开始打包。

contents.text: In other words, if one were to print out the compressed data as a sequence of bytes, starting with the first byte at the *right* margin and proceeding to the *left*, with the most significant bit of each byte on the left as usual, one would be able to parse the result from right to left, with fixed-width elements in the correct msb-to-lsb order and prefix codes in bit-reversed order (i.e., with the first bit of the code in the relative lsb position).
contents.zh-CHS: 换句话说，如果将压缩数据打印为一个字节序列，从*右*边距处的第一个字节开始，继续到*左*，每个字节的最高有效位像往常一样位于左侧，则可以从右到左解析结果，固定宽度元素的msb到lsb顺序正确，前缀代码的位顺序相反（即，代码的第一位位于相对lsb位置）。

contents.text: As an example, consider packing the following data elements into a sequence of 3 bytes: 3-bit integer value 6, 4-bit integer value 2, prefix code 110, prefix code 10, 12-bit integer value 3628.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为一个例子，考虑将下列数据元素打包成3字节的序列：3位整数值6、4位整数值2、前缀码110、前缀码10, 12位整数值3628。

contents.text: 2. Compressed Representation Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 压缩表示概述

contents.text: A compressed data set consists of a header and a series of meta-blocks. Each meta-block decompresses to a sequence of 0 to 16,777,216 (16 MiB) uncompressed bytes. The final uncompressed data is the concatenation of the uncompressed sequences from each meta-block.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩数据集由一个标头和一系列元块组成。每个元块解压缩为0到16777216（16 MiB）未压缩字节的序列。最终未压缩数据是来自每个元块的未压缩序列的串联。

contents.text: The header contains the size of the sliding window that was used during compression. The decompressor must retain at least that amount of uncompressed data prior to the current position in the stream, in order to be able to decompress what follows. The sliding window size is a power of two, minus 16, where the power is in the range of 10 to 24. The possible sliding window sizes range from 1 KiB - 16 B to 16 MiB - 16 B.
contents.zh-CHS: 标题包含压缩期间使用的滑动窗口的大小。解压器必须在流中的当前位置之前保留至少该数量的未压缩数据，以便能够解压接下来的内容。滑动窗口大小为2的幂减16，其中幂在10到24之间。可能的滑动窗口大小从1kib-16b到16mib-16b不等。

contents.text: Each meta-block is compressed using a combination of the LZ77 algorithm (Lempel-Ziv 1977, [LZ77]) and Huffman coding. The result of Huffman coding is referred to here as a "prefix code". The prefix codes for each meta-block are independent of those for previous or subsequent meta-blocks; the LZ77 algorithm may use a reference to a duplicated string occurring in a previous meta-block, up to the sliding window size of uncompressed bytes before. In addition, in the brotli format, a string reference may instead refer to a static dictionary entry.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用LZ77算法（Lempel-Ziv 1977，[LZ77]）和Huffman编码的组合对每个元块进行压缩。哈夫曼编码的结果在这里称为“前缀码”。每个元块的前缀码独立于先前或后续元块的前缀码；LZ77算法可以使用对发生在前一个元块中的重复字符串的引用，最大可达之前未压缩字节的滑动窗口大小。此外，在brotli格式中，字符串引用可以改为引用静态字典条目。

contents.text: Each meta-block consists of two parts: a meta-block header that describes the representation of the compressed data part and a compressed data part. The compressed data consists of a series of commands. Each command consists of two parts: a sequence of literal bytes (of strings that have not been detected as duplicated within the sliding window) and a pointer to a duplicated string, which is represented as a pair <length, backward distance>. There can be zero literal bytes in the command. The minimum length of the string to be
contents.zh-CHS: 每个元块由两部分组成：描述压缩数据部分表示的元块头和压缩数据部分。压缩数据由一系列命令组成。每个命令由两部分组成：文本字节序列（在滑动窗口中未检测到重复的字符串）和指向重复字符串的指针，重复字符串表示为一对<length，backward distance>。命令中可以有零个文本字节。要删除的字符串的最小长度

contents.text: duplicated is two, but the last command in the meta-block is permitted to have only literals and no pointer to a string to duplicate.
contents.zh-CHS: duplicated是2，但是元块中的最后一个命令只允许有文本，并且没有指向要复制的字符串的指针。

contents.text: Each command in the compressed data is represented using three categories of prefix codes:
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩数据中的每个命令都使用三类前缀代码表示：

contents.text: 1) One set of prefix codes are for the literal sequence lengths (also referred to as literal insertion lengths) and backward copy lengths. That is, a single code word represents two lengths: one of the literal sequence and one of the backward copy.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 一组前缀代码用于文字序列长度（也称为文字插入长度）和反向复制长度。也就是说，单个码字表示两种长度：一种是文字序列，另一种是反向拷贝。

contents.text: 2) One set of prefix codes are for literals.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 一组前缀代码用于文本。

contents.text: 3) One set of prefix codes are for distances.
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 一组前缀代码用于距离。

contents.text: The prefix code descriptions for each meta-block appear in a compact form just before the compressed data in the meta-block header. The insert-and-copy length and distance prefix codes may be followed by extra bits that are added to the base values determined by the codes. The number of extra bits is determined by the code.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个元块的前缀代码描述以紧凑的形式出现在元块头中的压缩数据之前。插入和复制长度和距离前缀代码后面可能会有额外的位，这些位被添加到由代码确定的基值中。额外位数由代码决定。

contents.text: One meta-block command then appears as a sequence of prefix codes:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，一个元块命令显示为一系列前缀代码：

contents.text: Insert-and-copy length, literal, literal, ..., literal, distance
contents.zh-CHS: 插入和复制长度、文字、文字、…、文字、距离

contents.text: where the insert-and-copy length defines an insertion length and a copy length. The insertion length determines the number of literals that immediately follow. The distance defines how far back to go for the copy and the copy length determines the number of bytes to copy. The resulting uncompressed data is the sequence of bytes:
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，插入和复制长度定义了插入长度和复制长度。插入长度决定紧跟其后的文字数。距离定义了拷贝的返回距离，拷贝长度决定了要拷贝的字节数。生成的未压缩数据是字节序列：

contents.text: literal, literal, ..., literal, copy, copy, ..., copy
contents.zh-CHS: 文字，文字，…，文字，复制，复制，…，复制

contents.text: where the number of literal bytes and copy bytes are determined by the insert-and-copy length code. (The number of bytes copied for a static dictionary entry can vary from the copy length.)
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，文字字节数和复制字节数由插入和复制长度代码确定。（为静态字典条目复制的字节数可能因复制长度而异。）

contents.text: The last command in the meta-block may end with the last literal if the total uncompressed length of the meta-block has been satisfied. In that case, there is no distance in the last command, and the copy length is ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果满足元块的总未压缩长度，则元块中的最后一个命令可能以最后一个文本结束。在这种情况下，最后一个命令中没有距离，复制长度将被忽略。

contents.text: There can be more than one prefix code for each category, where the prefix code to use for the next element of that category is determined by the context of the compressed stream that precedes that element. Part of that context is three current block types, one for
contents.zh-CHS: 每个类别可以有多个前缀代码，其中用于该类别下一个元素的前缀代码由该元素前面的压缩流的上下文确定。该上下文的一部分是三种当前块类型，一种用于

contents.text: each category. A block type is in the range of 0..255. For each category there is a count of how many elements of that category remain to be decoded using the current block type. Once that count is expended, a new block type and block count is read from the stream immediately preceding the next element of that category, which will use the new block type.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个类别。块类型的范围为0..255。对于每个类别，都有一个计数，该类别中还有多少元素需要使用当前块类型进行解码。一旦扩展了该计数，将从紧靠该类别下一个元素之前的流中读取一个新的块类型和块计数，该元素将使用新的块类型。

contents.text: The insert-and-copy block type directly determines which prefix code to use for the next insert-and-copy length. For the literal and distance elements, the respective block type is used in combination with other context information to determine which prefix code to use for the next element.
contents.zh-CHS: 插入和复制块类型直接决定下一次插入和复制长度使用的前缀代码。对于文字和距离元素，相应的块类型与其他上下文信息结合使用，以确定下一个元素使用哪个前缀代码。

contents.text: Consider the following example:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑下面的例子：

contents.text: (IaC0, L0, L1, L2, D0)(IaC1, D1)(IaC2, L3, L4, D2)(IaC3, L5, D3)

The meta-block here has four commands, contained in parentheses for clarity, where each of the three categories of symbols within these commands can be interpreted using different block types. Here we separate out each category as its own sequence to show an example of block types assigned to those elements. Each square-bracketed group is a block that uses the same block type:
contents.zh-CHS: 这里的元块有四个命令，为了清楚起见，括号中包含了四个命令，其中这些命令中的三类符号中的每一类都可以使用不同的块类型进行解释。在这里，我们将每个类别作为其自己的序列分开，以显示分配给这些元素的块类型的示例。每个方括号组都是使用相同块类型的块：

contents.text: [IaC0, IaC1][IaC2, IaC3] <-- insert-and-copy: block types 0 and 1
contents.zh-CHS: [IaC0，IaC1][IaC2，IaC3]<--插入和复制：块类型0和1

contents.text: [L0, L1][L2, L3, L4][L5] <-- literals: block types 0, 1, and 0
[D0][D1, D2, D3] <-- distances: block types 0 and 1

The subsequent blocks within each block category must have different block types, but we see that block types can be reused later in the meta-block. The block types are numbered from 0 to the maximum block type number of 255, and the first block of each block category is type 0. The block structure of a meta-block is represented by the sequence of block-switch commands for each block category, where a block-switch command is a pair <block type, block count>. The block-switch commands are represented in the compressed data before the start of each new block using a prefix code for block types and a separate prefix code for block counts for each block category. For the above example, the physical layout of the meta-block is then:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个块类别中的后续块必须具有不同的块类型，但我们可以看到块类型可以稍后在元块中重用。块类型的编号范围为0到最大块类型编号255，每个块类别的第一个块为类型0。元块的块结构由每个块类别的块切换命令序列表示，其中块切换命令是一对<block type，block count>。块开关命令在每个新块开始之前的压缩数据中表示，使用块类型的前缀代码和每个块类别的块计数的单独前缀代码。对于上述示例，元块的物理布局为：

contents.text:
IaC0 L0 L1 LBlockSwitch(1, 3) L2 D0 IaC1 DBlockSwitch(1, 3) D1
IaCBlockSwitch(1, 2) IaC2 L3 L4 D2 IaC3 LBlockSwitch(0, 1) L5 D3

where xBlockSwitch(t, n) switches to block type t for a count of n elements. In this example, note that DBlockSwitch(1, 3) immediately precedes the next required distance, D1. It does not follow the last
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，xBlockSwitch（t，n）切换到块类型t，用于n个元素的计数。在本例中，请注意DBlockSwitch（1，3）紧跟在下一个所需距离D1之前。它不跟在最后一个后面

contents.text: distance of the previous block, D0. Whenever an element of a category is needed, and the block count for that category has reached zero, then a new block type and count are read from the stream just before reading that next element.
contents.zh-CHS: 上一块的距离，D0。每当需要一个类别的元素，并且该类别的块计数已达到零时，就在读取下一个元素之前从流中读取一个新的块类型和计数。

contents.text: The block-switch commands for the first blocks of each category are not part of the meta-block compressed data. Instead, the first block type is defined to be 0, and the first block count for each category is encoded in the meta-block header. The prefix codes for the block types and counts, a total of six prefix codes over the three categories, are defined in a compact form in the meta-block header.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个类别的第一个块的块开关命令不是元块压缩数据的一部分。相反，第一个块类型定义为0，每个类别的第一个块计数编码在元块头中。块类型和计数的前缀码（三个类别中总共六个前缀码）以紧凑的形式定义在元块头中。

contents.text: Each category of value (insert-and-copy lengths, literals, and distances) can be encoded with any prefix code from a collection of prefix codes belonging to the same category appearing in the meta-block header. The particular prefix code used can depend on two factors: the block type of the block the value appears in and the context of the value. In the case of the literals, the context is the previous two bytes in the uncompressed data; and in the case of distances, the context is the copy length from the same command. For insert-and-copy lengths, no context is used and the prefix code depends only on the block type. In the case of literals and distances, the context is mapped to a context ID in the range 0..63 for literals and 0..3 for distances. The matrix of the prefix code indexes for each block type and context ID, called the context map, is encoded in a compact form in the meta-block header.
contents.zh-CHS: 每一类值（插入和复制长度、文字量和距离）都可以使用元块标题中出现的属于同一类别的前缀代码集合中的任何前缀代码进行编码。使用的特定前缀代码可能取决于两个因素：值出现在其中的块的块类型和值的上下文。对于文本，上下文是未压缩数据中的前两个字节；对于距离，上下文是同一命令的副本长度。对于插入和复制长度，不使用上下文，前缀代码仅取决于块类型。在文字和距离的情况下，上下文映射到范围为0..63（文字）和0..3（距离）的上下文ID。每个块类型和上下文ID的前缀代码索引矩阵（称为上下文映射）以紧凑的形式编码在元块头中。

contents.text: For example, the prefix code to use to decode L2 depends on the block type (1), and the literal context ID determined by the two uncompressed bytes that were decoded from L0 and L1. Similarly, the prefix code to use to decode D0 depends on the block type (0) and the distance context ID determined by the copy length decoded from IaC0. The prefix code to use to decode IaC3 depends only on the block type (1).
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，用于解码L2的前缀代码取决于块类型（1），以及由从L0和L1解码的两个未压缩字节确定的文字上下文ID。类似地，用于解码D0的前缀代码取决于块类型（0）和由从IaC0解码的副本长度确定的距离上下文ID。用于解码IaC3的前缀代码仅取决于块类型（1）。

contents.text: In addition to the parts listed above (prefix code for insert-and-copy lengths, literals, distances, block types, block counts, and the context map), the meta-block header contains the number of uncompressed bytes coded in the meta-block and two additional parameters used in the representation of match distances: the number of postfix bits and the number of direct distance codes.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了上面列出的部分（插入和复制长度、文字、距离、块类型、块计数和上下文映射的前缀代码），元块头包含元块中编码的未压缩字节数以及表示匹配距离时使用的两个附加参数：后缀位数和直接距离码数。

contents.text: A compressed meta-block may be marked in the header as the last meta-block, which terminates the compressed stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩的元块可以在报头中标记为最后一个元块，从而终止压缩流。

contents.text: A meta-block may, instead, simply store the uncompressed data directly as bytes on byte boundaries with no coding or matching strings. In this case, the meta-block header information only
contents.zh-CHS: 相反，元块可以简单地将未压缩的数据直接存储为字节边界上的字节，而无需编码或匹配字符串。在这种情况下，元块头信息仅限于

contents.text: contains the number of uncompressed bytes and the indication that the meta-block is uncompressed. An uncompressed meta-block cannot be the last meta-block.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含未压缩字节数和元块未压缩的指示。未压缩的元块不能是最后一个元块。

contents.text: A meta-block may also be empty, which generates no uncompressed data at all. An empty meta-block may contain metadata information as bytes starting on byte boundaries, which are not part of either the sliding window or the uncompressed data. Thus, these metadata bytes cannot be used to create matching strings in subsequent meta-blocks and are not used as context bytes for literals.
contents.zh-CHS: 元块也可能是空的，这根本不会生成未压缩的数据。空元块可以包含元数据信息，作为字节边界上开始的字节，这些字节不是滑动窗口或未压缩数据的一部分。因此，这些元数据字节不能用于在后续元块中创建匹配字符串，也不能用作文本的上下文字节。

contents.text: 3. Compressed Representation of Prefix Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 前缀码的压缩表示

contents.text: 3.1. Introduction to Prefix Coding
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. 前缀编码简介

contents.text: Prefix coding represents symbols from an a priori known alphabet by bit sequences (codes), one code for each symbol, in a manner such that different symbols may be represented by bit sequences of different lengths, but a parser can always parse an encoded string unambiguously symbol-by-symbol.
contents.zh-CHS: 前缀编码通过位序列（代码）表示来自先验已知字母表的符号，每个符号一个代码，其方式使得不同的符号可以由不同长度的位序列表示，但是解析器始终可以逐个符号明确地解析编码字符串。

contents.text: We define a prefix code in terms of a binary tree in which the two edges descending from each non-leaf node are labeled 0 and 1, and in which the leaf nodes correspond one-for-one with (are labeled with) the symbols of the alphabet. The code for a symbol is the sequence of 0's and 1's on the edges leading from the root to the leaf labeled with that symbol. For example:
contents.zh-CHS: 我们用二叉树定义前缀码，其中从每个非叶节点下降的两条边分别标记为0和1，叶节点与字母表的符号一一对应（标记为）。符号的代码是从根到标有该符号的叶的边上的0和1的序列。例如：

contents.text: A parser can decode the next symbol from the compressed stream by walking down the tree from the root, at each step choosing the edge corresponding to the next compressed data bit.
contents.zh-CHS: 解析器可以通过在每一步选择对应于下一个压缩数据位的边，从根沿着树向下走，从压缩流中解码下一个符号。

contents.text: Given an alphabet with known symbol frequencies, the Huffman algorithm allows the construction of an optimal prefix code (one that represents strings with those symbol frequencies using the fewest
contents.zh-CHS: 给定一个具有已知符号频率的字母表，哈夫曼算法允许构造一个最佳前缀代码（一个用最少的符号频率表示字符串的代码）

contents.text: bits of any possible prefix codes for that alphabet). Such a prefix code is called a Huffman code. (See [HUFFMAN] for additional information on Huffman codes.)
contents.zh-CHS: 该字母表的任何可能前缀代码的位）。这样的前缀码称为哈夫曼码。（有关哈夫曼代码的更多信息，请参见[哈夫曼]。）

contents.text: In the brotli format, note that the prefix codes for the various alphabets must not exceed certain maximum code lengths. This constraint complicates the algorithm for computing code lengths from symbol frequencies. Again, see [HUFFMAN] for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 在brotli格式中，请注意，各种字母的前缀代码不得超过某些最大代码长度。该约束使从符号频率计算代码长度的算法复杂化。再次请参见[HUFFMAN]了解详细信息。

contents.text: 3.2. Use of Prefix Coding in the Brotli Format
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 使用Brotli格式的前缀编码

contents.text: The prefix codes used for each alphabet in the brotli format are canonical prefix codes, which have two additional rules:
contents.zh-CHS: brotli格式中每个字母表使用的前缀代码都是规范前缀代码，具有两个附加规则：

contents.text: * All codes of a given bit length have lexicographically consecutive values, in the same order as the symbols they represent;
contents.zh-CHS: * 给定位长度的所有代码都具有按字典顺序排列的连续值，其顺序与其所表示的符号相同；

contents.text: * Shorter codes lexicographically precede longer codes.
contents.zh-CHS: * 较短的代码按字典顺序先于较长的代码。

contents.text: We could recode the example above to follow this rule as follows, assuming that the order of the alphabet is ABCD:
contents.zh-CHS: 假设字母表的顺序为ABCD，我们可以按照如下规则重新编码上面的示例：

contents.text:
Symbol  Code
------  ----
A       10
B       0
C       110
D       111
That is, 0 precedes 10, which precedes 11x, and 110 and 111 are lexicographically consecutive.
contents.zh-CHS: 也就是说，0先于10，10先于11x，110和111在词典上是连续的。

contents.text: Given this rule, we can define the canonical prefix code for an alphabet just by giving the bit lengths of the codes for each symbol of the alphabet in order; this is sufficient to determine the actual codes. In our example, the code is completely defined by the sequence of bit lengths (2, 1, 3, 3). The following algorithm generates the codes as integers, intended to be read from most to least significant bit. The code lengths are initially in tree[I].Len; the codes are produced in tree[I].Code.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据这个规则，我们可以定义一个字母表的规范前缀代码，只需按顺序给出字母表中每个符号的代码位长度；这足以确定实际代码。在我们的示例中，代码完全由位长度序列（2、1、3、3）定义。以下算法将代码生成为整数，用于从最高有效位到最低有效位读取。代码长度最初在树[I]中；代码在树[I]中生成。代码。

contents.text: 1) Count the number of codes for each code length. Let bl_count[N] be the number of codes of length N, N >= 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 计算每个代码长度的代码数。设bl_count[N]为长度为N，N>=1的代码数。

contents.text: 2) Find the numerical value of the smallest code for each code length:
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 查找每个代码长度的最小代码的数值：

contents.text: 3) Assign numerical values to all codes, using consecutive values for all codes of the same length with the base values determined at step 2. Codes that are never used (which have a bit length of zero) must not be assigned a value.
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 为所有代码指定数值，使用相同长度的所有代码的连续值和步骤2确定的基值。不得为从未使用过的代码（位长度为零）赋值。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: Consider the alphabet ABCDEFGH, with bit lengths (3, 3, 3, 3, 3, 2, 4, 4). After step 1, we have:
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑字母abcDeGH，位长（3, 3, 3，3, 3, 2，4, 4）。在第一步之后，我们有：

contents.text: Step 2 computes the following next_code values:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤2计算以下下一个\u代码值：

contents.text: Step 3 produces the following code values:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤3生成以下代码值：

contents.text: 3.3. Alphabet Sizes
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. 字母表大小

contents.text: Prefix codes are used for different purposes in the brotli format, and each purpose has a different alphabet size. For literal codes, the alphabet size is 256. For insert-and-copy length codes, the alphabet size is 704. For block count codes, the alphabet size is 26. For distance codes, block type codes, and the prefix codes used in compressing the context map, the alphabet size is dynamic and is based on parameters defined in later sections. The following table summarizes the alphabet sizes for the various prefix codes and the sections of this document in which they are defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 在brotli格式中，前缀代码用于不同的用途，并且每个用途具有不同的字母表大小。对于文字代码，字母表大小为256。对于插入和复制长度代码，字母表大小为704。对于块计数代码，字母表大小为26。对于压缩上下文映射时使用的距离码、块类型码和前缀码，字母表大小是动态的，并基于后面章节中定义的参数。下表总结了各种前缀代码的字母表大小以及本文档中定义它们的章节。

contents.text: 3.4. Simple Prefix Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. 简单前缀码

contents.text: The first two bits of the compressed representation of each prefix code distinguish between simple and complex prefix codes. If this value is 1, then a simple prefix code follows as described in this section. Otherwise, a complex prefix code follows as described in Section 3.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个前缀码的压缩表示的前两位区分简单前缀码和复杂前缀码。如果该值为1，则会出现一个简单的前缀代码，如本节所述。否则，将按照第3.5节中的说明使用复杂前缀代码。

contents.text: A simple prefix code can have up to four symbols with non-zero code length. The format of the simple prefix code is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 一个简单的前缀代码最多可以有四个非零代码长度的符号。简单前缀代码的格式如下所示：

contents.text:
2 bits: value of 1 indicates a simple prefix code
2 bits: NSYM - 1, where NSYM = number of symbols coded
NSYM symbols, each encoded using ALPHABET_BITS bits
contents.zh-CHS: NSYM符号，每个符号使用字母表\u位编码

contents.text: 1 bit: tree-select, present only for NSYM = 4
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：树选择，仅对NSYM=4显示

contents.text: The value of ALPHABET_BITS depends on the alphabet of the prefix code: it is the smallest number of bits that can represent all symbols in the alphabet. For example, for the alphabet of literal bytes, ALPHABET_BITS is 8. The value of each of the NSYM symbols above is the value of the ALPHABET_BITS width integer value. If the integer value is greater than or equal to the alphabet size, or the value is identical to a previous value, then the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 字母表_位的值取决于前缀代码的字母表：它是代表字母表中所有符号的最小位数。例如，对于文字字节的字母表，字母表_位是8。上面每个NSYM符号的值都是字母\u位宽度整数值的值。如果整数值大于或等于字母表大小，或者该值与前一个值相同，则流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: Note that the NSYM symbols may not be presented in sorted order. Prefix codes of the same bit length must be assigned to the symbols in sorted order.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，NSYM符号可能不会按排序顺序显示。必须按排序顺序将相同位长度的前缀代码分配给符号。

contents.text: The (non-zero) code lengths of the symbols can be reconstructed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 符号的（非零）代码长度可以如下重构：

contents.text: * if NSYM = 1, the code length for the one symbol is zero -- when encoding this symbol in the compressed data stream using this prefix code, no actual bits are emitted. Similarly, when decoding a symbol using this prefix code, no bits are read and the one symbol is returned.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果NSYM=1，则一个符号的代码长度为零——当使用此前缀代码在压缩数据流中编码此符号时，不会发出任何实际位。类似地，当使用该前缀码对符号进行解码时，不读取任何位，并且返回一个符号。

contents.text: * if NSYM = 2, both symbols have code length 1.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果NSYM=2，则两个符号的代码长度均为1。

contents.text: * if NSYM = 3, the code lengths for the symbols are 1, 2, 2 in the order they appear in the representation of the simple prefix code.
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果NSYM=3，则符号的代码长度为1、2、2，顺序与它们在简单前缀代码表示中出现的顺序相同。

contents.text: * if NSYM = 4, the code lengths (in order of symbols decoded) depend on the tree-select bit: 2, 2, 2, 2 (tree-select bit 0), or 1, 2, 3, 3 (tree-select bit 1).
contents.zh-CHS: * 如果NSYM=4，则代码长度（按照解码符号的顺序）取决于树选择位：2、2、2、2（树选择位0）或1、2、3、3（树选择位1）。

contents.text: 3.5. Complex Prefix Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5. 复前缀码

contents.text: A complex prefix code is a canonical prefix code, defined by the sequence of code lengths, as discussed in Section 3.2. For even greater compactness, the code length sequences themselves are compressed using a prefix code. The alphabet for code lengths is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 如第3.2节所述，复杂前缀代码是由代码长度序列定义的规范前缀代码。为了获得更大的紧凑性，代码长度序列本身使用前缀代码进行压缩。代码长度的字母表如下所示：

contents.text:
0..15: Represent code lengths of 0..15
   16: Copy the previous non-zero code length 3..6 times.
       The next 2 bits indicate repeat length
             (0 = 3, ... , 3 = 6)
       If this is the first code length, or all previous
       code lengths are zero, a code length of 8 is
       repeated 3..6 times.
       A repeated code length code of 16 modifies the
       repeat count of the previous one as follows:
          repeat count = (4 * (repeat count - 2)) +
                         (3..6 on the next 2 bits)
       Example:  Codes 7, 16 (+2 bits 11), 16 (+2 bits 10)
                 will expand to 22 code lengths of 7
                 (1 + 4 * (6 - 2) + 5)
   17: Repeat a code length of 0 for 3..10 times.
       The next 3 bits indicate repeat length
             (0 = 3, ... , 7 = 10)
       A repeated code length code of 17 modifies the
       repeat count of the previous one as follows:
          repeat count = (8 * (repeat count - 2)) +
                         (3..10 on the next 3 bits)

Note that a code of 16 that follows an immediately preceding 16 modifies the previous repeat count, which becomes the new repeat count. The same is true for a 17 following a 17. A sequence of three or more 16 codes in a row or three of more 17 codes in a row is possible, modifying the count each time. Only the final repeat count is used. The modification only applies if the same code follows. A 16 repeat does not modify an immediately preceding 17 count nor vice versa.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，紧跟在前一个16后面的代码16会修改前一个重复计数，这将成为新的重复计数。17之后的17也是如此。一行中有三个或更多16个代码的序列或一行中有三个或更多17个代码的序列是可能的，每次都修改计数。仅使用最终重复计数。修改仅适用于以下相同代码的情况。重复16次不会修改前一个17次计数，反之亦然。

contents.text: A code length of 0 indicates that the corresponding symbol in the alphabet will not occur in the compressed data, and it should not participate in the prefix code construction algorithm given earlier. A complex prefix code must have at least two non-zero code lengths.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码长度为0表示字母表中的对应符号不会出现在压缩数据中，并且不应参与前面给出的前缀代码构造算法。复杂前缀代码必须至少有两个非零代码长度。

contents.text: The bit lengths of the prefix code over the code length alphabet are compressed with the following variable-length code (as it appears in the compressed data, where the bits are parsed from right to left):
contents.zh-CHS: 代码长度字母表上前缀代码的位长度使用以下可变长度代码进行压缩（如压缩数据中所示，位从右向左解析）：

contents.text: We can now define the format of the complex prefix code as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 现在，我们可以按如下方式定义复杂前缀代码的格式：

contents.text: o 2 bits: HSKIP, the number of skipped code lengths, can have values of 0, 2, or 3. The skipped lengths are taken to be zero. (An HSKIP of 1 indicates a Simple prefix code.)
contents.zh-CHS: o 2位：HSKIP是跳过的代码长度数，其值可以为0、2或3。跳过的长度为零。（HSKIP为1表示简单的前缀代码。）

contents.text: o Code lengths for symbols in the code length alphabet given just above, in the order: 1, 2, 3, 4, 0, 5, 17, 6, 16, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15. If HSKIP is 2, then the code lengths for symbols 1 and 2 are zero, and the first code length is for symbol 3. If HSKIP is 3, then the code length for symbol 3 is also zero, and the first code length is for symbol 4.
contents.zh-CHS: o 上述代码长度字母表中符号的代码长度，顺序为：1、2、3、4、0、5、17、6、16、7、8、9、10、11、12、13、14、15。如果HSKIP为2，则符号1和2的代码长度为零，第一个代码长度为符号3。如果HSKIP为3，则符号3的代码长度也为零，而符号4的第一个代码长度为零。

contents.text: The code lengths of code length symbols are between 0 and 5, and they are represented with 2..4 bits according to the variable-length code above. A code length of 0 means the corresponding code length symbol is not used.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码长度符号的代码长度介于0和5之间，根据上述可变长度代码，它们用2..4位表示。代码长度为0表示不使用相应的代码长度符号。

contents.text: If HSKIP is 2 or 3, a respective number of leading code lengths are implicit zeros and are not present in the code length sequence above.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果HSKIP为2或3，则相应数量的前导代码长度为隐式零，并且不存在于上述代码长度序列中。

contents.text: If there are at least two non-zero code lengths, any trailing zero code lengths are omitted, i.e., the last code length in the sequence must be non-zero. In this case, the sum of (32 >> code length) over all the non-zero code lengths must equal to 32.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果至少有两个非零代码长度，则省略任何尾随的零代码长度，即序列中的最后一个代码长度必须为非零。在这种情况下，所有非零代码长度的总和（32>>代码长度）必须等于32。

contents.text: If the lengths have been read for the entire code length alphabet and there was only one non-zero code length, then the prefix code has one symbol whose code has zero length. In this case, that symbol results in no bits being emitted by the compressor and no bits consumed by the decompressor. That single symbol is immediately returned when this code is decoded. An example of where this occurs is if the entire code to be represented has symbols of length 8. For example, a literal code that represents
contents.zh-CHS: 如果已读取整个代码长度字母表的长度，并且只有一个非零代码长度，则前缀代码有一个代码长度为零的符号。在这种情况下，该符号不会导致压缩器发出任何比特，也不会导致解压缩器消耗任何比特。当该代码被解码时，该符号立即返回。出现这种情况的一个例子是，如果要表示的整个代码具有长度为8的符号。例如，表示

contents.text: all literal values with equal probability. In this case the single symbol is 16, which repeats the previous length. The previous length is taken to be 8 before any code length code lengths are read.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有具有相同概率的文字值。在这种情况下，单个符号为16，重复上一个长度。在读取任何代码长度之前，前一个长度取为8。

contents.text: o Sequence of code length symbols, which is at most the size of the alphabet, encoded using the code length prefix code. Any trailing 0 or 17 must be omitted, i.e., the last encoded code length symbol must be between 1 and 16. The sum of (32768 >> code length) over all the non-zero code lengths in the alphabet, including those encoded using repeat code(s) of 16, must be equal to 32768. If the number of times to repeat the previous length or repeat a zero length would result in more lengths in total than the number of symbols in the alphabet, then the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: o 代码长度符号序列，最大为字母表大小，使用代码长度前缀编码。必须省略任何尾随的0或17，即最后编码的代码长度符号必须介于1和16之间。字母表中所有非零代码长度的总和（32768>>代码长度），包括使用16的重复代码编码的代码长度，必须等于32768。如果重复上一个长度或重复零长度的次数将导致总长度超过字母表中的符号数，则流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: 4. Encoding of Distances
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 距离编码

contents.text: As described in Section 2, one component of a compressed meta-block is a sequence of backward distances. In this section, we provide the details to the encoding of distances.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第2节所述，压缩元块的一个组件是向后距离序列。在本节中，我们将提供距离编码的详细信息。

contents.text: Each distance in the compressed data part of a meta-block is represented with a pair <distance code, extra bits>. The distance code and the extra bits are encoded back-to-back, the distance code is encoded using a prefix code over the distance alphabet, while the extra bits value is encoded as a fixed-width integer value. The number of extra bits can be 0..24, and it is dependent on the distance code.
contents.zh-CHS: 元块的压缩数据部分中的每个距离用一对<distance code，extra bits>表示。距离码和额外位背靠背编码，距离码使用距离字母表上的前缀码编码，而额外位值编码为固定宽度整数值。额外比特数可以是0..24，这取决于距离码。

contents.text: To convert a distance code and associated extra bits to a backward distance, we need the sequence of past distances and two additional parameters: the number of "postfix bits", denoted by NPOSTFIX (0..3), and the number of direct distance codes, denoted by NDIRECT (0..120). Both of these parameters are encoded in the meta-block header. We will also use the following derived parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: 要将距离码和相关的额外位转换为后向距离，我们需要过去距离的序列和两个附加参数：NPOSTFIX（0..3）表示的“后缀位”数量和NDIRECT（0..120）表示的直接距离码数量。这两个参数都编码在元块头中。我们还将使用以下派生参数：

contents.text: POSTFIX_MASK = (1 << NPOSTFIX) - 1
The first 16 distance symbols are special symbols that reference past distances as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 前16个距离符号是参考过去距离的特殊符号，如下所示：

contents.text:
0: last distance
 1: second-to-last distance
 2: third-to-last distance
 3: fourth-to-last distance
 4: last distance - 1
 5: last distance + 1
 6: last distance - 2
 7: last distance + 2
 8: last distance - 3
 9: last distance + 3
10: second-to-last distance - 1
11: second-to-last distance + 1
12: second-to-last distance - 2
13: second-to-last distance + 2
14: second-to-last distance - 3
15: second-to-last distance + 3

The ring buffer of the four last distances is initialized by the values 16, 15, 11, and 4 (i.e., the fourth-to-last is set to 16, the third-to-last to 15, the second-to-last to 11, and the last distance to 4) at the beginning of the *stream* (as opposed to the beginning of the meta-block), and it is not reset at meta-block boundaries. When a distance symbol 0 appears, the distance it represents (i.e., the last distance in the sequence of distances) is not pushed to the ring buffer of last distances; in other words, the expression "second-to-last distance" means the second-to-last distance that was not represented by a 0 distance symbol (and similar for "third-to-last distance" and "fourth-to-last distance"). Similarly, distances that represent static dictionary words (see Section 8) are not pushed to the ring buffer of last distances.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后四个距离的环形缓冲区在*流*的开始处（与元块的开始相反）由值16、15、11和4（即，第四个到最后被设置为16，第三个到最后被设置为15，第二个到最后被设置为11，最后一个距离被设置为4）初始化，并且不在元块边界处重置。当出现距离符号0时，它表示的距离（即，距离序列中的最后一个距离）不会推送到最后一个距离的环形缓冲区；换言之，“第二到最后一个距离”表示未用0距离符号表示的第二到最后一个距离（与“第三到最后一个距离”和“第四到最后一个距离”类似）。类似地，表示静态字典单词的距离（参见第8节）不会推送到最后距离的环形缓冲区。

contents.text: If a special distance symbol resolves to a zero or negative value, the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果特殊距离符号解析为零值或负值，则流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: If NDIRECT is greater than zero, then the next NDIRECT distance symbols, from 16 to 15 + NDIRECT, represent distances from 1 to NDIRECT. Neither the special distance symbols nor the NDIRECT direct distance symbols are followed by any extra bits.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果NDIRECT大于零，则下一个NDIRECT距离符号（从16到15+NDIRECT）表示从1到NDIRECT的距离。特殊距离符号和NDIRECT直接距离符号后面都没有任何额外的位。

contents.text: Distance symbols 16 + NDIRECT and greater all have extra bits, where the number of extra bits for a distance symbol "dcode" is given by the following formula:
contents.zh-CHS: 距离符号16+NDIRECT及以上都有额外位，其中距离符号“dcode”的额外位数由以下公式给出：

contents.text: ndistbits = 1 + ((dcode - NDIRECT - 16) >> (NPOSTFIX + 1))
The maximum number of extra bits is 24; therefore, the size of the distance symbol alphabet is (16 + NDIRECT + (48 << NPOSTFIX)).
contents.zh-CHS: 额外比特的最大数目为24；因此，距离符号字母表的大小为（16+NDIRECT+（48<<NPOSTFIX））。

contents.text: Given a distance symbol "dcode" (>= 16 + NDIRECT), and extra bits "dextra", the backward distance is given by the following formula:
contents.zh-CHS: 给定距离符号“dcode”（>=16+NDIRECT）和额外位“dextra”，后向距离由以下公式给出：

contents.text:
hcode = (dcode - NDIRECT - 16) >> NPOSTFIX
lcode = (dcode - NDIRECT - 16) & POSTFIX_MASK
offset = ((2 + (hcode & 1)) << ndistbits) - 4
distance = ((offset + dextra) << NPOSTFIX) + lcode + NDIRECT + 1
5. Encoding of Literal Insertion Lengths and Copy Lengths
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 文字插入长度和拷贝长度的编码

contents.text: As described in Section 2, the literal insertion lengths and backward copy lengths are encoded using a single prefix code. This section provides the details to this encoding.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第2节所述，文字插入长度和反向复制长度使用单个前缀代码进行编码。本节提供此编码的详细信息。

contents.text: Each <insertion length, copy length> pair in the compressed data part of a meta-block is represented with the following triplet:
contents.zh-CHS: 元块压缩数据部分中的每个<insertion length，copy length>对用以下三元组表示：

contents.text: <insert-and-copy length code, insert extra bits, copy extra bits>
contents.zh-CHS: <插入并复制长度代码，插入额外位，复制额外位>

contents.text: The insert-and-copy length code, the insert extra bits, and the copy extra bits are encoded back-to-back, the insert-and-copy length code is encoded using a prefix code over the insert-and-copy length code alphabet, while the extra bits values are encoded as fixed-width integer values. The number of insert and copy extra bits can be 0..24, and they are dependent on the insert-and-copy length code.
contents.zh-CHS: 插入和复制长度代码、插入额外位和复制额外位背靠背编码，插入和复制长度代码使用插入和复制长度代码字母表上的前缀代码编码，而额外位值编码为固定宽度整数值。插入和复制额外位的数量可以是0..24，并且它们取决于插入和复制长度代码。

contents.text: Some of the insert-and-copy length codes also express the fact that the distance symbol of the distance in the same command is 0, i.e., the distance component of the command is the same as that of the previous command. In this case, the distance code and extra bits for the distance are omitted from the compressed data stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 某些插入和复制长度代码还表示，同一命令中距离的距离符号为0，即，该命令的距离分量与上一命令的距离分量相同。在这种情况下，从压缩数据流中省略距离码和用于距离的额外比特。

contents.text: We describe the insert-and-copy length code alphabet in terms of the (not directly used) insert length code and copy length code alphabets. The symbols of the insert length code alphabet, along with the number of insert extra bits, and the range of the insert lengths are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 我们根据（不直接使用的）插入长度代码和复制长度代码字母来描述插入和复制长度代码字母。插入长度代码字母表的符号、插入额外位的数量以及插入长度的范围如下所示：

contents.text: The symbols of the copy length code alphabet, along with the number of copy extra bits, and the range of copy lengths are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 复制长度代码字母表的符号、复制额外位的数量以及复制长度的范围如下所示：

contents.text: To convert an insert-and-copy length code to an insert length code and a copy length code, the following table can be used:
contents.zh-CHS: 要将插入和复制长度代码转换为插入长度代码和复制长度代码，可以使用下表：

contents.text: First, look up the cell with the 64 value range containing the insert-and-copy length code; this gives the insert length code and the copy length code ranges, both 8 values long. The copy length code within its range is determined by bits 0..2 (counted from the lsb) of the insert-and-copy length code. The insert length code within its range is determined by bits 3..5 (counted from the lsb) of the insert-and-copy length code. Given the insert length and copy length codes, the actual insert and copy lengths can be obtained by reading the number of extra bits given by the tables above.
contents.zh-CHS: 首先，查找包含插入和复制长度代码的64值范围的单元格；这将给出插入长度代码和复制长度代码范围，两者都有8个值长。其范围内的复制长度代码由插入和复制长度代码的位0..2（从lsb计数）确定。其范围内的插入长度代码由插入和复制长度代码的位3..5（从lsb计数）确定。给定插入长度和复制长度代码，可通过读取上表给出的额外位数获得实际插入长度和复制长度。

contents.text: If the insert-and-copy length code is between 0 and 127, the distance code of the command is set to zero (the last distance reused).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果插入和复制长度代码介于0和127之间，则命令的距离代码将设置为零（上次重复使用的距离）。

contents.text: 6. Encoding of Block-Switch Commands
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 块开关命令的编码

contents.text: As described in Section 2, a block-switch command is a pair <block type, block count>. These are encoded in the compressed data part of the meta-block, right before the start of each new block of a particular block category.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第2节所述，块切换命令是一对<block type，block count>。这些被编码在元块的压缩数据部分，就在特定块类别的每个新块开始之前。

contents.text: Each block type in the compressed data is represented with a block type code, encoded using a prefix code over the block type code alphabet. A block type symbol 0 means that the new block type is the same as the type of the previous block from the same block category, i.e., the block type that preceded the current type, while a block type symbol 1 means that the new block type equals the current block type plus one. If the current block type is the maximal possible, then a block type symbol of 1 results in wrapping to a new block type of 0. Block type symbols 2..257 represent block types 0..255, respectively. The previous and current block types are initialized to 1 and 0, respectively, at the end of the meta-block header.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩数据中的每个块类型用块类型代码表示，使用块类型代码字母表上的前缀代码进行编码。块类型符号0表示新块类型与来自同一块类别的前一块的类型相同，即当前类型之前的块类型，而块类型符号1表示新块类型等于当前块类型加1。如果当前块类型是可能的最大块类型，则块类型符号1将导致换行为新的块类型0。块类型符号2..257分别表示块类型0..255。在元块头的末尾，先前和当前块类型分别初始化为1和0。

contents.text: Since the first block type of each block category is 0, the block type of the first block-switch command is not encoded in the compressed data. If a block category has only one block type, the block count of the first block-switch command is also omitted from the compressed data; otherwise, it is encoded in the meta-block header.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于每个块类别的第一块类型为0，因此第一块开关命令的块类型未编码在压缩数据中。如果块类别只有一种块类型，则也从压缩数据中省略第一块切换命令的块计数；否则，它被编码在元块头中。

contents.text: Since the end of the meta-block is detected by the number of uncompressed bytes produced, the block counts for any of the three categories need not count down to exactly zero at the end of the meta-block.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于元块的结束是通过生成的未压缩字节数检测的，因此三个类别中任何一个的块计数不必在元块结束时精确地倒计时到零。

contents.text: The number of different block types in each block category, denoted by NBLTYPESL, NBLTYPESI, and NBLTYPESD for literals, insert-and-copy lengths, and distances, respectively, is encoded in the meta-block header, and it must equal to the largest block type plus one in that block category. In other words, the set of literal, insert-and-copy length, and distance block types must be [0..NBLTYPESL-1], [0..NBLTYPESI-1], and [0..NBLTYPESD-1], respectively. From this it follows that the alphabet size of literal, insert-and-copy length, and distance block type codes is NBLTYPESL + 2, NBLTYPESI + 2, and NBLTYPESD + 2, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个块类别中不同块类型的数量（分别用NBLTYPESL、NBLTYPESI和NBLTYPESD表示文字、插入和复制长度以及距离）编码在元块标题中，并且必须等于该块类别中最大的块类型加上一个。换句话说，文本、插入和复制长度以及距离块类型的集合必须分别为[0..NBLTYPESL-1]、[0..NBLTYPESI-1]和[0..NBLTYPESD-1]。由此可知，文字、插入和复制长度以及距离块类型代码的字母表大小分别为NBLTYPESL+2、NBLTYPESI+2和NBLTYPESD+2。

contents.text: Each block count in the compressed data is represented with a pair <block count code, extra bits>. The block count code and the extra bits are encoded back-to-back, the block count code is encoded using a prefix code over the block count code alphabet, while the extra bits value is encoded as a fixed-width integer value. The number of extra bits can be 0..24, and it is dependent on the block count code.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩数据中的每个块计数用一对<block count code，extra bits>表示。块计数代码和额外位背靠背编码，块计数代码使用块计数代码字母表上的前缀代码编码，而额外位值编码为固定宽度整数值。额外位的数量可以是0..24，这取决于块计数代码。

contents.text: The symbols of the block count code alphabet along with the number of extra bits and the range of block counts are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码字母表的符号以及额外位数和块计数范围如下所示：

contents.text: The first block-switch command of each block category is special in the sense that it is encoded in the meta-block header, and as described earlier, the block type code is omitted since it is an implicit zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个块类别的第一个块切换命令是特殊的，因为它被编码在元块头中，并且如前所述，块类型代码被省略，因为它是隐式零。

contents.text: 7. Context Modeling
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 上下文建模

contents.text: As described in Section 2, the prefix tree used to encode a literal byte or a distance code depends on the block type and the context ID. This section specifies how to compute the context ID for a particular literal and distance code and how to encode the context map that maps a <block type, context ID> pair to the index of a prefix code in the array of literal and distance prefix codes.
contents.zh-CHS: 如第2节所述，用于编码文字字节或距离码的前缀树取决于块类型和上下文ID。本节指定如何计算特定文字和距离码的上下文ID，以及如何编码映射<块类型，上下文ID>与文本和距离前缀代码数组中前缀代码的索引配对。

contents.text: 7.1. Context Modes and Context ID Lookup for Literals
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1. 文本的上下文模式和上下文ID查找

contents.text: The context for encoding the next literal is defined by the last two bytes in the stream (p1, p2, where p1 is the most recent byte), regardless of whether these bytes are produced by uncompressed meta-blocks, backward references, static dictionary references, or by literal insertions. At the start of the stream, p1 and p2 are initialized to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码下一个文本的上下文由流中的最后两个字节（p1，p2，其中p1是最近的字节）定义，而不管这些字节是由未压缩的元块、向后引用、静态字典引用还是由文本插入生成的。在流的开始，p1和p2被初始化为零。

contents.text: There are four methods, called context modes, to compute the Context ID:
contents.zh-CHS: 有四种称为上下文模式的方法来计算上下文ID：

contents.text: * LSB6, where the Context ID is the value of six least significant bits of p1,
contents.zh-CHS: * LSB6，其中上下文ID是p1的六个最低有效位的值，

contents.text: * MSB6, where the Context ID is the value of six most significant bits of p1,
contents.zh-CHS: * MSB6，其中上下文ID是p1的六个最高有效位的值，

contents.text: * UTF8, where the Context ID is a complex function of p1, p2, optimized for text compression, and
contents.zh-CHS: * UTF8，其中上下文ID是p1、p2的复杂函数，为文本压缩而优化，以及

contents.text: * Signed, where Context ID is a complex function of p1, p2, optimized for compressing sequences of signed integers.
contents.zh-CHS: * 有符号，其中上下文ID是p1、p2的复函数，优化用于压缩有符号整数序列。

contents.text: The Context ID for the UTF8 and Signed context modes is computed using the following lookup tables Lut0, Lut1, and Lut2.
contents.zh-CHS: UTF8和有符号上下文模式的上下文ID使用以下查找表Lut0、Lut1和Lut2计算。

contents.text: The lengths and the CRC-32 check values (see Appendix C) of each of these tables as a sequence of bytes are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个表的长度和CRC-32校验值（见附录C）作为字节序列如下：

contents.text:
Table    Length    CRC-32
-----    ------    ------
Lut0     256       0x8e91efb7
Lut1     256       0xd01a32f4
Lut2     256       0x0dd7a0d6
Given p1 is the last uncompressed byte and p2 is the second-to-last uncompressed byte, the context IDs can be computed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 假设p1是最后一个未压缩字节，p2是倒数第二个未压缩字节，则上下文ID的计算如下：

contents.text:
For LSB6:    Context ID = p1 & 0x3f
For MSB6:    Context ID = p1 >> 2
For UTF8:    Context ID = Lut0[p1] | Lut1[p2]
For Signed:  Context ID = (Lut2[p1] << 3) | Lut2[p2]
From the lookup tables defined above and the operations to compute the context IDs, we can see that context IDs for literals are in the range of 0..63.
contents.zh-CHS: 从上面定义的查找表和计算上下文ID的操作中，我们可以看到文本的上下文ID在0..63的范围内。

contents.text: The context modes LSB6, MSB6, UTF8, and Signed are denoted by integers 0, 1, 2, 3.
contents.zh-CHS: 上下文模式LSB6、MSB6、UTF8和有符号模式由整数0、1、2、3表示。

contents.text: A context mode is defined for each literal block type and they are stored in a consecutive array of bits in the meta-block header, always two bits per block type.
contents.zh-CHS: 为每个文本块类型定义上下文模式，它们存储在元块头中的连续位数组中，每个块类型始终为两位。

contents.text: 7.2. Context ID for Distances
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2. 距离的上下文ID

contents.text: The context for encoding a distance code is defined by the copy length corresponding to the distance. The context IDs are 0, 1, 2, and 3 for copy lengths 2, 3, 4, and more than 4, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: 编码距离代码的上下文由与距离对应的副本长度定义。对于副本长度2、3、4和大于4，上下文ID分别为0、1、2和3。

contents.text: 7.3. Encoding of the Context Map
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3. 上下文映射的编码

contents.text: There are two context maps, one for literals and one for distances. The size of the context map is 64 * NBLTYPESL for literals, and 4 * NBLTYPESD for distances. Each value in the context map is an integer between 0 and 255, indicating the index of the prefix code to be used when encoding the next literal or distance.
contents.zh-CHS: 有两个上下文映射，一个用于文字，另一个用于距离。对于文字，上下文映射的大小为64*NBLTYPESL，对于距离，上下文映射的大小为4*NBLTYPESD。上下文映射中的每个值都是一个介于0和255之间的整数，表示编码下一个文字或距离时要使用的前缀代码的索引。

contents.text: The context maps are two-dimensional matrices, encoded as one-dimensional arrays:
contents.zh-CHS: 上下文映射是二维矩阵，编码为一维数组：

contents.text:
CMAPL[0..(64 * NBLTYPESL - 1)]
CMAPD[0..(4 * NBLTYPESD - 1)]
The index of the prefix code for encoding a literal or distance code with block type, BTYPE_x, and context ID, CIDx, is:
contents.zh-CHS: 用于编码具有块类型BTYPE_x和上下文ID CIDx的文字或距离代码的前缀代码的索引为：

contents.text:
index of literal prefix code = CMAPL[64 * BTYPE_L + CIDL]
index of distance prefix code = CMAPD[4 * BTYPE_D + CIDD]

The values of the context map are encoded with the combination of run length encoding for zero values and prefix coding. Let RLEMAX denote the number of run length codes and NTREES denote the maximum value in the context map plus one. NTREES must equal the number of different values in the context map; in other words, the different values in the context map must be the [0..NTREES-1] interval. The alphabet of the prefix code has the following RLEMAX + NTREES symbols:
contents.zh-CHS: 上下文映射的值使用零值的游程编码和前缀编码的组合进行编码。让RLEMAX表示运行长度代码的数量，NTREES表示上下文映射中的最大值加上一。NTREES必须等于上下文映射中不同值的数量；换句话说，上下文映射中的不同值必须是[0..NTREES-1]间隔。前缀代码的字母表具有以下RLEMAX+NTREES符号：

contents.text:
0: value zero
1: repeat a zero 2 to 3 times, read 1 bit for repeat length
2: repeat a zero 4 to 7 times, read 2 bits for repeat length
...
RLEMAX: repeat a zero (1 << RLEMAX) to (1 << (RLEMAX+1))-1
        times, read RLEMAX bits for repeat length
RLEMAX + 1: value 1
...
RLEMAX + NTREES - 1: value NTREES - 1

If RLEMAX = 0, the run length coding is not used and the symbols of the alphabet are directly the values in the context map. We can now define the format of the context map (the same format is used for literal and distance context maps):
contents.zh-CHS: 如果RLEMAX=0，则不使用行程编码，字母表的符号直接为上下文映射中的值。我们现在可以定义上下文映射的格式（文本和距离上下文映射使用相同的格式）：

contents.text: 1..5 bits: RLEMAX, 0 is encoded with one 0 bit, and values 1..16 are encoded with bit pattern xxxx1 (so 01001 is 5)
contents.zh-CHS: 1..5位：RLEMAX，0用一个0位编码，值1..16用位模式xxxx1编码（所以01001是5）

contents.text: Prefix code with alphabet size NTREES + RLEMAX
contents.zh-CHS: 字母大小为NTREES+RLEMAX的前缀代码

contents.text: Context map size values encoded with the above prefix code and run length coding for zero values. If a run length would result in more lengths in total than the size of the context map, then the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用上述前缀代码编码的上下文映射大小值和零值的游程长度编码。如果运行长度导致的总长度超过上下文映射的大小，则流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: 1 bit: IMTF bit, if set, we do an inverse move-to-front transform on the values in the context map to get the prefix code indexes.
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：IMTF位，如果设置，我们对上下文映射中的值进行反向移动到前面的变换，以获得前缀代码索引。

contents.text: Note that RLEMAX may be larger than the value necessary to represent the longest sequence of zero values. Also, the NTREES value is encoded right before the context map as described in Section 9.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，RLEMAX可能大于表示最长零值序列所需的值。此外，NTREES值在上下文映射之前进行编码，如第9.2节所述。

contents.text: We define the inverse move-to-front transform used in this specification by the following C language function:
contents.zh-CHS: 我们通过以下C语言函数定义了本规范中使用的逆向前移动变换：

contents.text: Note that the inverse move-to-front transform will not produce values outside the [0..NTREES-1] interval.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，反向向前移动变换不会产生[0..NTREES-1]间隔之外的值。

contents.text: 8. Static Dictionary
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 静态词典

contents.text: At any given point during decoding the compressed data, a reference to a duplicated string in the uncompressed data produced so far has a maximum backward distance value, which is the minimum of the window size and the number of uncompressed bytes produced. However, decoding a distance from the compressed stream, as described in Section 4, can produce distances that are greater than this maximum allowed value. In this case, the distance is treated as a reference to a word in the static dictionary given in Appendix A. The copy length for a static dictionary reference must be between 4 and 24. The static dictionary has three parts:
contents.zh-CHS: 在解码压缩数据期间的任何给定点，对迄今为止生成的未压缩数据中的重复字符串的引用具有最大向后距离值，该值是窗口大小和生成的未压缩字节数的最小值。然而，如第4节所述，解码与压缩流的距离可以产生大于该最大允许值的距离。在这种情况下，该距离被视为对附录a中给出的静态词典中某个单词的引用。静态词典引用的副本长度必须在4到24之间。静态词典有三个部分：

contents.text: * DICT[0..DICTSIZE], an array of bytes * DOFFSET[0..24], an array of byte-offset values for each length * NDBITS[0..24], an array of bit-depth values for each length
contents.zh-CHS: * DICT[0..DICTSIZE]，字节数组*DOFFSET[0..24]，每个长度的字节偏移值数组*NDBITS[0..24]，每个长度的位深度值数组

contents.text: The number of static dictionary words for a given length is:
contents.zh-CHS: 给定长度的静态词典单词数为：

contents.text:
NWORDS[length] = 0                       (if length < 4)
NWORDS[length] = (1 << NDBITS[length])   (if length >= 4)
DOFFSET and DICTSIZE are defined by the following recursion:
contents.zh-CHS: DOFFSET和DICTSIZE由以下递归定义：

contents.text:
DOFFSET[0] = 0
DOFFSET[length + 1] = DOFFSET[length] + length * NWORDS[length]
DICTSIZE = DOFFSET[24] + 24 * NWORDS[24]
The offset of a word within the DICT array for a given length and index is:
contents.zh-CHS: DICT数组中给定长度和索引的单词偏移量为：

contents.text: offset(length, index) = DOFFSET[length] + index * length

Each static dictionary word has 121 different forms, given by applying a word transformation to a base word in the DICT array. The list of word transformations is given in Appendix B. The static dictionary word for a <length, distance> pair can be reconstructed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个静态字典单词有121种不同的形式，通过对DICT数组中的一个基词应用单词转换得到。单词转换列表见附录B。a<length，distance>对的静态词典单词可按如下方式重建：

contents.text:
word_id = distance - (max allowed distance + 1)
index = word_id % NWORDS[length]
base_word = DICT[offset(length, index)..offset(length, index+1)-1]
transform_id = word_id >> NDBITS[length]

The string copied to the uncompressed stream is computed by applying the transformation to the base dictionary word. If transform_id is greater than 120, or the length is smaller than 4 or greater than 24, then the compressed stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 复制到未压缩流的字符串是通过将转换应用于基本字典单词来计算的。如果transform_id大于120，或长度小于4或大于24，则压缩流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: Each word transformation has the following form:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个单词转换具有以下形式：

contents.text: transform_i(word) = prefix_i + T_i(word) + suffix_i
where the _i subscript denotes the transform_id above. Each T_i is one of the following 21 elementary transforms:
contents.zh-CHS: 其中_i下标表示上面的变换_id。每个T_i是以下21个基本变换之一：

contents.text: Identity, FermentFirst, FermentAll, OmitFirst1, ..., OmitFirst9, OmitLast1, ..., OmitLast9
contents.zh-CHS: 标识，发酵优先，发酵全部，省略第一个，…，省略第一个9，省略最后一个1，…，省略最后一个9

contents.text: The form of these elementary transforms is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些基本变换的形式如下所示：

contents.text: Identity(word) = word
contents.zh-CHS: 身份（词）=词

contents.text: FermentFirst(word) = see below
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个（单词）=见下文

contents.text: FermentAll(word) = see below
contents.zh-CHS: 全部（word）=见下文

contents.text:
OmitFirstk(word) = the last (length(word) - k) bytes of word, or
                   empty string if length(word) < k

OmitLastk(word) = the first (length(word) - k) bytes of word, or
                  empty string if length(word) < k
We define the FermentFirst and FermentAll transforms used in this specification by the following C language functions:
contents.zh-CHS: 我们通过以下C语言函数定义本规范中使用的第一个和所有转换：

contents.text: Appendix B contains the list of transformations by specifying the prefix, elementary transform and suffix components of each of them. Note that the OmitFirst8 elementary transform is not used in the list of transformations. The strings in Appendix B are in C-string format with respect to escape (backslash) characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B通过指定每个变换的前缀、基本变换和后缀组件，包含变换列表。请注意，在转换列表中未使用OmitFirst8初等转换。附录B中的字符串是关于转义（反斜杠）字符的C字符串格式。

contents.text: The maximum number of additional bytes that a transform may add to a base word is 13. Since the largest base word is 24 bytes long, a buffer of 38 bytes is sufficient to store any transformed words (counting a terminating zero byte).
contents.zh-CHS: 转换可添加到基字的最大附加字节数为13。由于最大的基字是24字节长，38字节的缓冲区足以存储任何转换的字（包括终止的零字节）。

contents.text: 9. Compressed Data Format
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 压缩数据格式

contents.text: In this section, we describe the format of the compressed data set in terms of the format of the individual data items described in the previous sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本节中，我们将根据前面几节中描述的各个数据项的格式来描述压缩数据集的格式。

contents.text: 9.1. Format of the Stream Header
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. 流标题的格式

contents.text: The stream header has only the following one field:
contents.zh-CHS: 流标头只有以下一个字段：

contents.text: 1..7 bits: WBITS, a value in the range 10..24, encoded with the following variable-length code (as it appears in the compressed data, where the bits are parsed from right to left):
contents.zh-CHS: 1..7位：WBITS，范围为10..24的值，用以下可变长度代码编码（如压缩数据中所示，位从右到左解析）：

contents.text: Note that bit pattern 0010001 is invalid and must not be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，位模式0010001无效，不得使用。

contents.text: The size of the sliding window, which is the maximum value of any non-dictionary reference backward distance, is given by the following formula:
contents.zh-CHS: 滑动窗口的大小是任何非字典参考向后距离的最大值，由以下公式给出：

contents.text: window size = (1 << WBITS) - 16
9.2. Format of the Meta-Block Header
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. 元块头的格式

contents.text: A compliant compressed data set has at least one meta-block. Each meta-block contains a header with information about the uncompressed length of the meta-block, and a bit signaling if the meta-block is the last one. The format of the meta-block header is the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 兼容压缩数据集至少有一个元块。每个元块都包含一个标头，其中包含有关元块未压缩长度的信息，如果元块是最后一个，则包含一个位信令。元块标头的格式如下所示：

contents.text: 1 bit: ISLAST, set to 1 if this is the last meta-block
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：ISLAST，如果这是最后一个元块，则设置为1

contents.text: 1 bit: ISLASTEMPTY, if set to 1, the meta-block is empty; this field is only present if ISLAST bit is set -- if it is 1, then the meta-block and the brotli stream ends at that bit, with any remaining bits in the last byte of the compressed stream filled with zeros (if the fill bits are not zero, then the stream should be rejected as invalid)
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：ISLASTEMPTY，如果设置为1，则元块为空；仅当ISLAST位设置为1时，此字段才存在——如果它为1，则元块和brotli流在该位结束，压缩流最后一个字节中的任何剩余位都用零填充（如果填充位不是零，则流应被视为无效而拒绝）

contents.text: 2 bits: MNIBBLES, number of nibbles to represent the uncompressed length, encoded with the following fixed-length code:
contents.zh-CHS: 2位：MNIBBLES，表示未压缩长度的半字节数，用以下固定长度代码编码：

contents.text: If MNIBBLES is 0, the meta-block is empty, i.e., it does not generate any uncompressed data. In this case, the rest of the meta-block has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果MNIBBLES为0，则元块为空，即它不会生成任何未压缩的数据。在这种情况下，元块的其余部分具有以下格式：

contents.text: 1 bit: reserved, must be zero
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：保留，必须为零

contents.text: 2 bits: MSKIPBYTES, number of bytes to represent metadata length
contents.zh-CHS: 2位：MSKIPBYTES，表示元数据长度的字节数

contents.text: MSKIPBYTES * 8 bits: MSKIPLEN - 1, where MSKIPLEN is the number of metadata bytes; this field is only present if MSKIPBYTES is positive; otherwise, MSKIPLEN is 0 (if MSKIPBYTES is greater than 1, and the last byte is all zeros, then the stream should be rejected as invalid)
contents.zh-CHS: MSKIPBYTES*8位：MSKIPLEN-1，其中MSKIPLEN是元数据字节数；仅当MSKIPBYTES为正时，此字段才存在；否则，MSKIPLEN为0（如果MSKIPBYTES大于1，且最后一个字节均为零，则该流应被视为无效而拒绝）

contents.text: 0..7 bits: fill bits until the next byte boundary, must be all zeros
contents.zh-CHS: 0..7位：填充位直到下一个字节边界，必须全部为零

contents.text: MSKIPLEN bytes of metadata, not part of the uncompressed data or the sliding window
contents.zh-CHS: MSKIPLEN字节的元数据，而不是未压缩数据或滑动窗口的一部分

contents.text: MNIBBLES * 4 bits: MLEN - 1, where MLEN is the length of the meta-block uncompressed data in bytes (if MNIBBLES is greater than 4, and the last nibble is all zeros, then the stream should be rejected as invalid)
contents.zh-CHS: MNIBBLES*4位：MLEN-1，其中MLEN是元块未压缩数据的长度（以字节为单位）（如果MNIBBLES大于4，且最后一个半字节均为零，则流应被视为无效而拒绝）

contents.text: 1 bit: ISUNCOMPRESSED, if set to 1, any bits of compressed data up to the next byte boundary are ignored, and the rest of the meta-block contains MLEN bytes of literal data; this field is only present if the ISLAST bit is not set (if the ignored bits are not all zeros, the stream should be rejected as invalid)
contents.zh-CHS: 1位：ISUNCOMPRESSED，如果设置为1，则忽略下一个字节边界之前的任何压缩数据位，元块的其余部分包含MLEN字节的文字数据；仅当未设置ISLAST位时，此字段才会出现（如果忽略的位不全为零，则流应被视为无效而拒绝）

contents.text: 1..11 bits: NBLTYPESL, number of literal block types, encoded with the following variable-length code (as it appears in the compressed data, where the bits are parsed from right to left, so 0110111 has the value 12):
contents.zh-CHS: 1..11位：NBLTYPESL，文字块类型的数量，用以下可变长度代码编码（如压缩数据中所示，位从右向左解析，因此011011的值为12）：

contents.text: Prefix code over the block type code alphabet for literal block types, appears only if NBLTYPESL >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESL>=2时，文字块类型的块类型代码字母表上的前缀代码才会出现

contents.text: Prefix code over the block count code alphabet for literal block counts, appears only if NBLTYPESL >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESL>=2时，才会显示文字块计数的块计数代码字母表上的前缀代码

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for first literal block count, appears only if NBLTYPESL >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+第一个文字块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESL>=2时出现

contents.text: 1..11 bits: NBLTYPESI, number of insert-and-copy block types, encoded with the same variable-length code as above
contents.zh-CHS: 1..11位：NBLTYPESI，插入和复制块类型的数量，使用与上述相同的可变长度代码编码

contents.text: Prefix code over the block type code alphabet for insert-and-copy block types, appears only if NBLTYPESI >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESI>=2时，插入和复制块类型的块类型代码字母表上的前缀代码才会出现

contents.text: Prefix code over the block count code alphabet for insert-and-copy block counts, appears only if NBLTYPESI >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESI>=2时，插入和复制块计数的块计数代码字母表上的前缀代码才会出现

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for first insert-and-copy block count, appears only if NBLTYPESI >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+第一次插入和复制块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESI>=2时出现

contents.text: 1..11 bits: NBLTYPESD, number of distance block types, encoded with the same variable-length code as above
contents.zh-CHS: 1..11位：NBLTYPESD，距离块类型的数量，使用与上述相同的可变长度代码编码

contents.text: Prefix code over the block type code alphabet for distance block types, appears only if NBLTYPESD >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESD>=2时，距离块类型的块类型代码字母表上的前缀代码才会出现

contents.text: Prefix code over the block count code alphabet for distance block counts, appears only if NBLTYPESD >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESD>=2时，才会显示距离块计数的块计数代码字母表上的前缀代码

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for first distance block count, appears only if NBLTYPESD >= 2
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+第一距离块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESD>=2时才显示

contents.text: 2 bits: NPOSTFIX, parameter used in the distance coding
contents.zh-CHS: 2位：NPOSTFIX，用于距离编码的参数

contents.text: 4 bits: four most significant bits of NDIRECT, to get the actual value of the parameter NDIRECT, left-shift this four-bit number by NPOSTFIX bits
contents.zh-CHS: 4位：NDIRECT的四个最高有效位，要获得参数NDIRECT的实际值，请将这四位数字左移NPOSTFIX位

contents.text: NBLTYPESL * 2 bits: context mode for each literal block type
contents.zh-CHS: NBLTYPESL*2位：每个文本块类型的上下文模式

contents.text: 1..11 bits: NTREESL, number of literal prefix trees, encoded with the same variable-length code as NBLTYPESL
contents.zh-CHS: 1..11位：NTREESL，文字前缀树的数量，使用与NBLTYPESL相同的可变长度代码进行编码

contents.text: Literal context map, encoded as described in Section 7.3, appears only if NTREESL >= 2; otherwise, the context map has only zero values
contents.zh-CHS: 按照第7.3节所述编码的文字上下文映射仅在NTREESL>=2时出现；否则，上下文映射只有零值

contents.text: 1..11 bits: NTREESD, number of distance prefix trees, encoded with the same variable-length code as NBLTYPESD
contents.zh-CHS: 1..11位：NTREESD，距离前缀树的数量，使用与NBLTYPESD相同的可变长度代码进行编码

contents.text: Distance context map, encoded as described in Section 7.3, appears only if NTREESD >= 2; otherwise, the context map has only zero values
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NTREESD>=2时，才会出现按照第7.3节所述编码的距离上下文图；否则，上下文映射只有零值

contents.text: NTREESL prefix codes for literals
contents.zh-CHS: 文本的NTREESL前缀代码

contents.text: NBLTYPESI prefix codes for insert-and-copy lengths
contents.zh-CHS: 用于插入和复制长度的NBLTYPESI前缀代码

contents.text: NTREESD prefix codes for distances
contents.zh-CHS: NTREESD距离前缀码

contents.text: 9.3. Format of the Meta-Block Data
contents.zh-CHS: 9.3. 元数据块数据的格式

contents.text: The compressed data part of a meta-block consists of a series of commands. Each command has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 元块的压缩数据部分由一系列命令组成。每个命令的格式如下：

contents.text: Block type code for next insert-and-copy block type, appears only if NBLTYPESI >= 2 and the previous insert-and-copy block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESI>=2且上一个插入和复制块计数为零时，才会显示下一个插入和复制块类型的块类型代码

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for next insert-and-copy block count, appears only if NBLTYPESI >= 2 and the previous insert-and-copy block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+下一次插入和复制块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESI>=2且上一次插入和复制块计数为零时才会出现

contents.text: Insert-and-copy length, encoded as in Section 5, using the insert-and-copy length prefix code with the current insert-and-copy block type index
contents.zh-CHS: 插入和复制长度，按照第5节中的编码，使用带有当前插入和复制块类型索引的插入和复制长度前缀代码

contents.text: Insert length number of literals, with the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 插入文字的长度编号，格式如下：

contents.text: Block type code for next literal block type, appears only if NBLTYPESL >= 2 and the previous literal block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 下一个文字块类型的块类型代码，仅当NBLTYPESL>=2且上一个文字块计数为零时才显示

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for next literal block count, appears only if NBLTYPESL >= 2 and the previous literal block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+下一个文字块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESL>=2且上一个文字块计数为零时才会出现

contents.text: Next byte of the uncompressed data, encoded with the literal prefix code with the index determined by the previous two bytes of the uncompressed data, the current literal block type, and the context map, as described in Section 7.3
contents.zh-CHS: 未压缩数据的下一个字节，用文字前缀代码编码，索引由未压缩数据的前两个字节、当前文字块类型和上下文映射确定，如第7.3节所述

contents.text: Block type code for next distance block type, appears only if NBLTYPESD >= 2 and the previous distance block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 仅当NBLTYPESD>=2且上一个距离块计数为零时，下一个距离块类型的块类型代码才会出现

contents.text: Block count code + extra bits for next distance block count, appears only if NBLTYPESD >= 2 and the previous distance block count is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 块计数代码+下一个距离块计数的额外位，仅当NBLTYPESD>=2且上一个距离块计数为零时才会出现

contents.text: Distance code, encoded as in Section 4, using the distance prefix code with the index determined by the copy length, the current distance block type, and the distance context map, as described in Section 7.3, appears only if the distance code is not an implicit 0, as indicated by the insert-and-copy length code
contents.zh-CHS: 如第7.3节所述，使用距离前缀代码编码的距离代码，其索引由复制长度、当前距离块类型和距离上下文映射确定，仅当距离代码不是隐含的0时（如插入和复制长度代码所示），才会显示距离代码，如第4节所述

contents.text: The number of commands in the meta-block is such that the sum of the uncompressed bytes produced (i.e., the number of literals inserted plus the number of bytes copied from past data or generated from the static dictionary) over all the commands gives the uncompressed length, MLEN encoded in the meta-block header.
contents.zh-CHS: 元块中的命令数量使得在所有命令上产生的未压缩字节（即插入的文字数量加上从过去数据复制或从静态字典生成的字节数量）之和给出元块头中编码的未压缩长度MLEN。

contents.text: If the total number of uncompressed bytes produced after the insert part of the last command equals MLEN, then the copy length of the last command is ignored and will not produce any uncompressed output. In this case, the copy length of the last command can have any value. In any other case, if the number of literals to insert, the copy length, or the resulting dictionary word length would cause MLEN to be exceeded, then the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在最后一个命令的插入部分之后生成的未压缩字节总数等于MLEN，则忽略最后一个命令的复制长度，并且不会生成任何未压缩的输出。在这种情况下，最后一个命令的复制长度可以有任何值。在任何其他情况下，如果要插入的文本数、副本长度或生成的字典单词长度会导致MLEN被超过，则流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: If the last command of the last non-empty meta-block does not end on a byte boundary, the unused bits in the last byte must be zeros.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果最后一个非空元块的最后一个命令不在字节边界上结束，则最后一个字节中未使用的位必须为零。

contents.text: 10. Decoding Algorithm
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 解码算法

contents.text: The decoding algorithm that produces the uncompressed data is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 产生未压缩数据的解码算法如下：

contents.text: read window size do read ISLAST bit if ISLAST read ISLASTEMPTY bit if ISLASTEMPTY break from loop read MNIBBLES if MNIBBLES is zero verify reserved bit is zero read MSKIPLEN skip any bits up to the next byte boundary skip MSKIPLEN bytes continue to the next meta-block else read MLEN if not ISLAST read ISUNCOMPRESSED bit if ISUNCOMPRESSED skip any bits up to the next byte boundary copy MLEN bytes of compressed data as literals continue to the next meta-block
contents.zh-CHS: 读取窗口大小是否读取ISLAST位如果ISLAST读取ISLASTEMPTY位如果ISLASTEMPTY从循环中断读取MNibles如果MNibles为零验证保留位为零读取MSKIPLEN跳过任何位直到下一个字节边界跳过MSKIPLEN字节继续到下一个元块否则读取MLEN如果不是ISLAST读取ISUNCOMPRESSED位如果ISUNCOMPRESSED跳过任何直到下一个字节边界的位将压缩数据的MLEN字节复制为文字继续复制到下一个元块

contents.text:
loop for each three block categories (i = L, I, D)
   read NBLTYPESi
   if NBLTYPESi >= 2
      read prefix code for block types, HTREE_BTYPE_i
      read prefix code for block counts, HTREE_BLEN_i
      read block count, BLEN_i
      set block type, BTYPE_i to 0
      initialize second-to-last and last block types to 0 and 1
   else
      set block type, BTYPE_i to 0
      set block count, BLEN_i to 16777216
read NPOSTFIX and NDIRECT
read array of literal context modes, CMODE[]
read NTREESL
if NTREESL >= 2
   read literal context map, CMAPL[]
else
   fill CMAPL[] with zeros
read NTREESD
if NTREESD >= 2
   read distance context map, CMAPD[]
else
   fill CMAPD[] with zeros
read array of literal prefix codes, HTREEL[]
read array of insert-and-copy length prefix codes, HTREEI[]
read array of distance prefix codes, HTREED[]
do
   if BLEN_I is zero
      read block type using HTREE_BTYPE_I and set BTYPE_I
         save previous block type
      read block count using HTREE_BLEN_I and set BLEN_I
   decrement BLEN_I
   read insert-and-copy length symbol using HTREEI[BTYPE_I]
   compute insert length, ILEN, and copy length, CLEN
   loop for ILEN
      if BLEN_L is zero
         read block type using HTREE_BTYPE_L and set BTYPE_L
            save previous block type
         read block count using HTREE_BLEN_L and set BLEN_L
      decrement BLEN_L
      look up context mode CMODE[BTYPE_L]
      compute context ID, CIDL from last two uncompressed bytes
      read literal using HTREEL[CMAPL[64*BTYPE_L + CIDL]]
      write literal to uncompressed stream
   if number of uncompressed bytes produced in the loop for
      this meta-block is MLEN, then break from loop (in this
      case the copy length is ignored and can have any value)

if distance code is implicit zero from insert-and-copy code set backward distance to the last distance else if BLEN_D is zero read block type using HTREE_BTYPE_D and set BTYPE_D save previous block type read block count using HTREE_BLEN_D and set BLEN_D decrement BLEN_D compute context ID, CIDD from CLEN read distance code using HTREED[CMAPD[4*BTYPE_D + CIDD]] compute distance by distance short code substitution if distance code is not zero, and distance is not a static dictionary reference, push distance to the ring buffer of last distances if distance is less than the max allowed distance plus one move backwards distance bytes in the uncompressed data, and copy CLEN bytes from this position to the uncompressed stream else look up the static dictionary word, transform the word as directed, and copy the result to the uncompressed stream while number of uncompressed bytes for this meta-block < MLEN while not ISLAST
contents.zh-CHS: 如果距离代码是从插入和复制代码到最后一个距离的隐式零，则设置向后距离；如果BLEN_D是零，则使用HTREE_BTYPE_D读取块类型，并设置BTYPE_D使用HTREE_BLEN_D保存以前的块类型读取块计数，并设置BLEN_D减量BLEN_D使用HTREED[CMAPD]从CLEN读取距离代码计算上下文ID、CIDD[4*B类型D+CIDD]]如果距离代码不为零，且距离不是静态字典引用，则通过距离短代码替换计算距离；如果距离小于最大允许距离加上未压缩数据中的一个向后移动距离字节，则将距离推送到最后距离的环形缓冲区，并将CLEN字节从此位置复制到uncompressed stream else查找静态字典单词，按指示转换单词，并将结果复制到未压缩的流，同时此元块的未压缩字节数<MLEN而非ISLAST

contents.text: If the stream ends before the completion of the last meta-block, then the stream should be rejected as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果流在最后一个元块完成之前结束，则该流应被视为无效而拒绝。

contents.text: Note that a duplicated string reference may refer to a string in a previous meta-block, i.e., the backward distance may cross one or more meta-block boundaries. However, a backward copy distance will not refer past the beginning of the uncompressed stream or the window size; any such distance is interpreted as a reference to a static dictionary word. Also, note that the referenced string may overlap the current position, for example, if the last 2 bytes decoded have values X and Y, a string reference with <length = 5, distance = 2> adds X,Y,X,Y,X to the uncompressed stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，重复的字符串引用可能指先前元块中的字符串，即，向后距离可能跨越一个或多个元块边界。但是，反向复制距离不会超过未压缩流的开始或窗口大小；任何这样的距离都被解释为对静态词典单词的引用。另外，请注意，所引用的字符串可能与当前位置重叠，例如，如果解码的最后2个字节具有值X和Y，则<length=5，distance=2>的字符串引用将X，Y，X，Y，X添加到未压缩流中。

contents.text: 11. Considerations for Compressor Implementations
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 压缩机实施的注意事项

contents.text: Since the intent of this document is to define the brotli compressed data format without reference to any particular compression algorithm, the material in this section is not part of the definition of the format, and a compressor need not follow it in order to be compliant.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于本文件的目的是定义brotli压缩数据格式，而不参考任何特定的压缩算法，因此本节中的内容不属于格式定义的一部分，压缩机无需遵循该格式即可符合要求。

contents.text: 11.1. Trivial Compressor
contents.zh-CHS: 11.1. 小型压缩机

contents.text: In this section, we present a very simple algorithm that produces a valid brotli stream representing an arbitrary sequence of uncompressed bytes in the form of the following C++ language function.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本节中，我们提出了一个非常简单的算法，它产生了一个有效的BROTLI流，它代表了C++语言函数形式的任意未压缩字节序列。

contents.text: Note that this simple algorithm does not actually compress data, that is, the brotli representation will always be bigger than the original, but it shows that every sequence of N uncompressed bytes can be represented with a valid brotli stream that is not longer than N + (3 * (N >> 16) + 5) bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，这个简单的算法实际上并不压缩数据，也就是说，brotli表示将始终大于原始值，但它表明，N个未压缩字节的每个序列都可以用不超过N+（3*（N>>16）+5）字节的有效brotli流来表示。
